sen.j: 6代目 小川 後楽（おがわ こうらく、1940年4月22日 -）は、煎茶道家（小川流6代目家元）。
sen.e: The sixth Koraku OGAWA (April 22, 1940-) is a master of sencha (green leaf tea) tea ceremony (the 6th grand master of the Ogawa school).
The sixth Koraku OGAWA (April 22, 1940-) is a master of sencha (green leaf tea) tea ceremony (the sixth grand master of the Ogawa school).
The sixth Koraku OGAWA (April 22, 1940-) is a master of sencha (green leaf tea) tea ceremony (the sixth grand master of the Ogawa school).
His pen name is Tadao NARABAYASHI.
His pen name is Tadao NARABAYASHI.
His pen name is Tadao NARABAYASHI.

sen.j: 京都造形芸術大学教授、同大学理事を兼任。
sen.e: He is Professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is concurrently a director of the university.
He is a professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is concurrently a director of the university.
He is a professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is concurrently a director of the university.

sen.j: また関西学院大学非常勤講師、仏教大学客員教授としても教壇に立つ。
sen.e: He also teaches at Kwansei Gakuin University as a part-time lecturer and at Bukkyo University as a visiting professor.
He also teaches at Kwansei Gakuin University as a part-time lecturer and at Bukkyo University as a visiting professor.
He also teaches at Kwansei Gakuin University as a part-time lecturer and at Bukkyo University as a visiting professor.

sen.j: 専門は日本文化論、伝統芸能史。
sen.e: His specialty is the studies of Japanese culture and the history of traditional performance arts.
His specialty is the studies of Japanese culture and the history of traditional performance arts.
His specialty is the studies of Japanese culture and the history of traditional performance arts.
Born in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
Born in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
Born in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 1963年（昭和38年）、立命館大学文学部日本史学科卒業。
sen.e: Graduated from Japanese History Major, College of Letters, Ritsumeikan University in 1963
Graduated from Japanese History Major, College of Letters, Ritsumeikan University in 1963
Graduated from Japanese History Major, College of Letters, Ritsumeikan University in 1963

sen.j: 奈良本辰也の下で日本近世思想史を専攻し、卒業後は京都芸術文化研究所に入所した。
sen.e: Learned the history of ideas of the early-modern Japan under Tatsuya NARAMOTO, and entered Kyoto Research Institute of Art and Culture after graduation
sen.cmt: 「京都芸術文化研究所」なる組織についての情報（URL等）がありませんでしたので仮訳です。
sen.e: Learned the history of ideas of the early-modern Japan under Tatsuya NARAMOTO, and entered Kyoto Research Institute of Art and Culture after graduation
Learned the history of ideas of the early-modern Japan under Tatsuya NARAMOTO, and entered Kyoto Research Institute of Art and Culture after graduation

sen.j: 1971年（昭和46年）、小川流煎茶家元を継承する。
sen.e: Succeeded to the grand master of the Ogawa school of sencha tea ceremony in 1971
Succeeded to the grand master of the Ogawa school of sencha tea ceremony in 1971
Succeeded to the grand master of the Ogawa school of sencha tea ceremony in 1971

sen.j: 1991年（平成3年）より、京都造形芸術大学客員教授に就任し、現在教授。
sen.e: Took office as a visiting professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is currently a professor
Took office as a visiting professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is currently a professor
Took office as a visiting professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design, and is currently a professor

sen.j: 1979年（昭和54年）、第1回訪中以後、ほぼ毎年1-3回、現在までにおよそ四十回近く訪中。
sen.e: Having visited China in 1979 for the first time, he has made 1 to 3 visits to China almost every year paying a total of around 40 visits to that country.
Having visited China in 1979 for the first time, he has made 1 to 3 visits to China almost every year paying a total of around 40 visits to that country.
Having visited China in 1979 for the first time, he has made 1 to 3 visits to China almost every year paying a total of around 40 visits to that country.

sen.j: また過去、陝西師範大学、雲南民族学院、北京大学等に短期留学の経験もある。
sen.e: Also, he has so far studied abroad for a short time in such educational institutes as Shaanxi Normal University, Yunnan Nationalities Institute and Peking University.
Also, he has so far studied abroad for a short time in such educational institutes as Shaanxi Normal University, Yunnan Nationalities Institute and Peking University.
Also, he has so far studied abroad for a short time in such educational institutes as Shaanxi Normal University, Yunnan Nationalities Institute and Peking University.

sen.j: 喫茶文化のルーツへの強い関心から、中国各地の名茶及び、茶の文化・歴史等を現地調査を重ねる。
sen.e: Based on his great interest in the roots of the tea drinking culture, he has repeatedly conducted a number of field surveys of noted brands of tea, culture and history of tea, etc, in various parts of China.

Based on his great interest in the roots of the tea drinking culture, he has repeatedly conducted a number of field surveys of noted brands of tea, culture and history of tea, etc, in various parts of China.

Based on his great interest in the roots of the tea drinking culture, he has repeatedly conducted a number of field surveys of noted brands of tea, culture and history of tea, etc, in various parts of China.

sen.j: 中国の歴史、とりわけ中国喫茶史に造詣が深く、日中の喫茶史をテーマに、新聞・雑誌・テレビ・ラジオ・講演等で公表。
sen.e: He has gained a profound knowledge of the Chinese history, or the history of tea drinking in China in particular, which he has so far imparted to people through newspaper and magazine articles, radio and television talks and giving lectures, on the theme of the Japanese and Chinese histories of tea drinking.

He has gained a profound knowledge of the Chinese history, or the history of tea drinking in China in particular, which he has so far imparted to people through newspaper and magazine articles, radio and television talks and giving lectures, on the theme of the Japanese and Chinese histories of tea drinking.

He has gained a profound knowledge of the Chinese history, or the history of tea drinking in China in particular, which he has so far imparted to people through newspaper and magazine articles, radio and television talks and giving lectures, on the theme of the Japanese and Chinese histories of tea drinking.

sen.j: また近年は、日本庭園研究センター（京都造形芸術大学内）代表尼崎博正らと共に近代庭園の空間特質に見られる煎茶的要素に関する研究の為、現地調査を重ねる。
sen.e: In recent years, he has been doing a number of field surveys, together with other researchers including Hiromasa AMASAKI, Director of Research Center for Japanese Garden Art and Historical Heritage (in Kyoto University of Design and Art), for the research on the sencha-related factors observed within the spatial characteristics of the gardens of the modern times.
sen.cmt: 「日本庭園研究センター」の現在の名称は「日本庭園・歴史遺産研究センターです。特に改名前の時代が重要とは思えず、また代表者も尼崎氏で同じであることから新しい英文名を採用しました。「近代」と「近世」とを同義にとってearly-modern（＝近世）にするか、単にmodernにするかで迷いましたが、広辞苑などにある通説「近代：日本史では明治維新から太平洋戦争の終結まで」に基づき後者を採用しています。
sen.e: In recent years, he has been doing a number of field surveys, together with other researchers including Hiromasa AMASAKI, Director of Research Center for Japanese Garden Art and Historical Heritage (in Kyoto University of Design and Art), for the research on the sencha-related factors observed within the spatial characteristics of the gardens of the modern times.

In recent years, he has been doing a number of field surveys, together with other researchers including Hiromasa AMASAKI, Director of Research Center for Japanese Garden Art and Historical Heritage (in Kyoto University of Design and Art), for the research on the sencha-related factors observed within the spatial characteristics of the gardens of the modern times.

sen.j: 同センター発表の2005年（平成17年）「近代庭園の空間特質に見られる煎茶的要素に関する研究」の論文にて「煎茶文化と煎茶的要素」を担当し発表する。
sen.e: He was in charge of the section relating to 'sencha culture and sencha-related factors' of the thesis entitled 'Research on Sencha-related Factors Observed within the Spatial Characteristics of the Gardens of the Modern Times' which was announced by the Center in 2005, and exhibited his research findings in the thesis.

He was in charge of the section relating to 'sencha culture and sencha-related factors' of the thesis entitled 'Research on Sencha-related Factors Observed within the Spatial Characteristics of the Gardens of the Modern Times' which was announced by the center in 2005, and exhibited his research findings in the thesis.

He was in charge of the section relating to 'sencha culture and sencha-related factors' of the thesis entitled 'Research on Sencha-related Factors Observed within the Spatial Characteristics of the Gardens of the Modern Times' which was announced by the center in 2005, and exhibited his research findings in the thesis.
